sentences.sContent: Can you guess what the extra processing is here?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you guess what the extra processing is here?
sentences.sCn: 您可以猜出这里的额外处理是什么吗？

sentences.sContent: As this processing loop is not required, it is unhooked from the collaboration.
sentences.sContent_eng: As this processing loop is not required, it is unhooked from the collaboration.
sentences.sCn: 由于并不需要这个处理循环，所以将其从协作中去除。

sentences.sContent: But its most natural target is in automation of system scripting and text processing tasks.
sentences.sContent_eng: But its most natural target is in automation of system scripting and text processing tasks.
sentences.sCn: 但是它最自然的目标在于系统脚本的自动化和本文处理任务。

sentences.sContent: ...Standardization of forms for automatic processing will save a lot of medical expenses...
...In processing foods after the agricultural stage...
...both on the farm and in the storage and processing facilities...
...storage and processing facilities ensure that a larger proportion of the food produced reaches markets and consumers...

synos.tran: 加工；[自]处理；对…起诉（process的ing形式）

phrases.pCn: 信息处理；信息加工；情报整理
食品加工，食品处理；进食，食品热杀菌
n. 炼油厂；石油加工厂
加工贸易；委托加工贸易
